title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The control example exhibits excessive flashing when the window is resized vertically. All tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
OB: When running the control example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The expected behavior is that only the bottom edge of the outermost frames needs to be repainted.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Run the control example.
2. Resize the window vertically.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
